name: Bandol (Var)
description:
Bandol (Var)

by fizzhog

Made for FLATJAM 2017

Controls: WASD

Really don't know what I was thinking when I made this. It just sort of happened. Trying to figure out what it was led me to reread the following:

Bandol (Var) by Stevie Smith
The Man Without a Temperament by Katherine Mansfield

Read 'em - if just one person reads either of those writers because of something I made then my entire game making 'career' will have been worth it!

Sound made from recordings found on freesound.org
I mucked about with them quite a lot but the originals I used are by these people:
Recording of the sea
http://freesound.org/people/digifishmusic/
Recording of music box
http://www.freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/

Windows version made available for download in case of problems with browser version
